title: RansomEye UBA Signal Summary
description: Frozen schema for signal summaries. All fields are mandatory. Zero optional fields allowed.

summary_id.description: Unique identifier for this summary (UUID v4)

observation_window_start.description: RFC3339 UTC timestamp of observation window start

observation_window_end.description: RFC3339 UTC timestamp of observation window end

signal_count.description: Total number of signals in observation window

interpretation_types_present.description: Interpretation types present in observation window (explicit enumeration)

summary_hash.description: SHA256 hash of summary content (for validation)

immutable_hash.description: SHA256 hash of summary record (immutability guarantee)

ledger_entry_id.description: Audit ledger entry ID for this summary
